author: Teasa B
review: Wasn't the best or safest place to live. My husband and I lived in a front apartment and had very few problems with our neighbors, none after the one got evicted. I had very kind and chatty neighbors and I actually miss them now that we've

author: Joseph
review: No problems with management or maintenance, as all employees are very charming and genuine people. Complaints and maintenance are dealt with in good time.
